title: BRIEF-‍Kirkland Lake Gold Reports Strong Growth In Mineral Reserves And Mineral Resources​
text: February 21, 2018 / 7:34 AM / in 23 minutes BRIEF-‍Kirkland Lake Gold Reports Strong Growth In Mineral Reserves And Mineral Resources​ Reuters Staff Feb 21 (Reuters) - Kirkland Lake Gold Ltd: * ‍KIRKLAND LAKE GOLD REPORTS STRONG GROWTH IN MINERAL RESERVES AND MINERAL RESOURCES​ * KIRKLAND LAKE GOLD-‍CONSOLIDATED MINERAL RESERVES INCREASE 36% TO 4,640,000 OUNCES @ 11.1 GRAMS PER TONNE VERSUS 3,420,000 OUNCES @ 9.0 G/T AT DEC 31, 2016​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
